      • isStdNumber

        public static boolean isStdNumber(String value)
        Determines if the given value is a "standard" number:
        • includes: integer and floating point numbers
        • excludes: scientific, hexidecimal, and type qualifiers

        see: http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/javadocs/api-release/org/apache/commons/lang3/math/NumberUtils.html#isParsable-java.lang.String-

        Parameters:
        value - (whitespace is NOT trimmed)
